thread.title: Airstrikes on Aadchit and Khiam - MTV Lebanon
thread.title_full: Airstrikes on Aadchit and Khiam - MTV Lebanon

title: Airstrikes on Aadchit and Khiam - MTV Lebanon
text: The National News Agency reported that hostile warplanes launched an airstrike targeting the town of Aadchit El Qsair in the Marjayoun district. Additionally, artillery shelling hit the town of Khyam in the Wadi Al-Asafir area. Airstrikes on Aadchit and Khiam [Previous](/en/News/Live_Feed/1490135/nna--an-israeli-drone-targeted-a-car-in-al-housh--east-of-tyre) - [NNA: An Israeli drone targeted a car in Al-Housh, east of Tyre](/en/News/Live_Feed/1490135/nna--an-israeli-drone-targeted-a-car-in-al-housh--east-of-tyre) - [Mawlawi to MTV: The support of Lebanon's friendly nations is what guarantees its stability and security](/en/News/Live_Feed/1490136/mawlawi-to-mtv--the-support-of-lebanon-s-friendly-nations-is-what-guarantees-its-stability-and-security) - [Mawlawi to MTV: No one can deny the sacrifices of the Lebanese Army, and no one has asked it to confront Israeli aircraft; its responsibility is to implement Resolution 1701](/en/News/Live_Feed/1490138/mawlawi-to-mtv--no-one-can-deny-the-sacrifices-of-the-lebanese-army--and-no-one-has-asked-it-to-confront-israeli-aircraft--its-responsibility-is-to-implement-resolution-1701) - [Watch: Airstrikes on Ghazieh, Saida](/en/News/Local/1490142/watch--airstrikes-on-ghazieh--saida)
